entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is mentioned as a chapter title.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and has a troubled night's sleep.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being in Harry's dream and talking to him in the morning.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being in Harry's dream and wearing a crown.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as having bewitched his trunk to fly downstairs.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as having bewitched his trunk to fly downstairs.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being knocked down two flights of stairs by Fred and George's flying trunks.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as sobbing over Kreacher's dead body and screaming at the top of her voice.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as being dead and watched by Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: mrs. black
entities.description: Mrs. Black is mentioned as screaming at the top of her voice.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron interact with each other in the morning.
Fred and George collaborate to bewitch their trunks to fly downstairs.
Fred's flying trunk collides with Ginny, knocking her down two flights of stairs.
George's flying trunk collides with Ginny, knocking her down two flights of stairs.
Mrs. Weasley has an emotional connection to Kreacher's dead body and is sobbing over it.
